prod_short_desc: Enjoy a delicious pizza at the LEGO® DUPLO® Pizzeria!
prod_long_desc:
Play out real-life scenarios in LEGO® DUPLO® My Town: a recognizable world with modern DUPLO figures. Toddlers will love serving delicious pizza straight from the oven in this colorful restaurant, while learning the routines and etiquette of eating out. They can also take orders over the phone then load up the bike for delivery. Includes three DUPLO figures.
Includes three LEGO® DUPLO® figures: a restaurant owner, dad and a child.
Features a buildable pizzeria with opening pizza oven, outdoor seating area with umbrella, ice cream stand and a delivery bike.
Includes bricks decorated as tomatoes, cheese, ice cream, pepper grinder, money and oven controls as story starters.
Accessory elements include three pizzas with two different toppings, cash register, ice cream, cup, and a mobile phone.
Help your child take a delicious pizza out of the oven and serve it to customers in the outdoor seating area.
Toddlers will enjoy taking orders over the phone, then driving the bike to deliver them.
Use the modern characters, accessories and decorated bricks to have fun while helping your toddler learn the routines and etiquette of eating out.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be safe and suitable for small hands.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 2-5.
Pizzeria measures over 7” high, 7” wide and 3” long.
Delivery bike measures over 1” high, 3” long and 1” wide.
There are several My Town products to collect and play out your child’s everyday life in a recognizable LEGO® DUPLO® world.
